name: C.J. Young

topics.response_text: You're my hero, ma'am. I want to be just like you when I grow up.

topics.topic: MS03RCHistory1Could I ask you about Rivet City's history?
topics.topic_text: Do you know anything about the city's history?
topics.response_text: James says his dad built it, but I don't know. I think he's making stuff up.

topics.topic_text: This is your mess, kid. Get yourself out of it.
topics.response_text: You're just mean! I hope your Mom and Dad die!

topics.topic_text: Sure, kid. Sorry I said those things. Let's get you home.
topics.response_text: Thank you, mister. I promise to be good from now on.

conversation.response_text: Hey, Dad, can you tell me a story? Tell me one about when people could drink the river.
James isn't so bad, Chief. He's my friend. I'll make sure he's good.
Why are you so mean sometimes? I'm always nice to you.
I don't know, what do you want to do?

description:
C.J. Young is a 12 year-old Caucasian Female.

A cheerful and trusting young resident of Rivet City who serves as the best friend of troubled James Hargrave. Despite living in the post-apocalyptic wasteland, C.J. maintains an optimistic outlook on life, spending her days exploring the aircraft carrier or relaxing on the flight deck.

C.J. Young's Personality: Optimistic, trusting, honest, and resilient. C.J. maintains a childlike innocence despite the harshness of the wasteland. She's forgiving and loyal, particularly to her best friend James, even when he teases her relentlessly. Her positive attitude is a rare beacon in the Capital Wasteland.

C.J. Young's Backstory: Born and raised in Rivet City to Christie and Henry Young, C.J. has lived a relatively sheltered life compared to most wasteland children. Her parents, both respected members of the Rivet City community, have provided her with a stable upbringing. From a young age, she formed a close bond with James Hargrave, who is a year younger than her. Despite James's troubled nature and occasional teasing, C.J. remains his most steadfast friend, often acting as a calming presence in his life.
